tasks.run-tests: deno task generate-artifacts && deno test --allow-read --allow-write src-test/
tasks.watch-tests: deno task generate-artifacts && deno test --watch --allow-write --allow-read src-test/
tasks.lint: deno lint src-pkg/ src-build/ src-cli/ src-test/ src-utils/
tasks.compile-cli: deno compile --allow-read --allow-write src-cli/lioncore-cli.ts && mv lioncore-cli lib/
